common.i18n_demo_description: Showcasing Pagemaker CMS multilingual support features
common.欢迎使用 Pagemaker CMS，这里是您的内容管理中心: Welcome to Pagemaker CMS, your content management center
common.管理您的页面模板，创建和编辑页面内容: Manage your page templates, create and edit page content
common.创建您的第一个页面开始使用: Create your first page to get started
common.确定要删除这个页面吗？此操作不可撤销。: Are you sure you want to delete this page? This action cannot be undone.

errors.NETWORK_ERROR: Network connection failed. Please check your network connection and try again
errors.NETWORK_TIMEOUT: Request timed out. Please try again later
errors.NETWORK_OFFLINE: Network is offline. Please check your network connection
errors.AUTH_TOKEN_EXPIRED: Login has expired. Please log in again
errors.AUTH_INVALID_CREDENTIALS: Invalid username or password. Please try again
errors.AUTH_UNAUTHORIZED: You don't have permission to access this resource
errors.VALIDATION_REQUIRED_FIELD: Please fill in the required fields
errors.VALIDATION_INVALID_FORMAT: Invalid input format. Please check and try again
errors.VALIDATION_FILE_TOO_LARGE: File size exceeds limit. Please select a smaller file
errors.SERVER_INTERNAL_ERROR: Server encountered an issue. Please try again later
errors.SERVER_MAINTENANCE: System is under maintenance. Please visit later
errors.SERVER_OVERLOAD: Server is busy. Please try again later
errors.CONFLICT_VERSION: Data has been modified by another user. Please refresh and try again
errors.CONFLICT_DUPLICATE: This data already exists. Please check and try again
errors.EDITOR_SAVE_FAILED: Failed to save page. Please check your network connection and try again
errors.EDITOR_LOAD_FAILED: Failed to load page. Please refresh the page and try again
errors.EDITOR_MODULE_INVALID: Module configuration is invalid. Please check the configuration and try again
errors.NOT_FOUND: The requested resource does not exist
errors.抱歉，您访问的页面不存在。: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist.
errors.不存在或您没有访问权限: does not exist or you don't have access permission
errors.删除页面失败，请重试: Failed to delete page, please try again

editor.title: Page Editor
editor.selectModuleHint: Please select a module in the canvas to edit its properties
editor.创建和编辑您的页面内容: Create and edit your page content

auth.请填写完整的用户名和密码: Please fill in complete username and password
auth.登录失败，请稍后重试: Login failed, please try again later
